default.name: Solun:
default.text: So... The Judge has finally come.

default.name: Solun:
default.text: It appears my people were right that you would one day bring us to ruin, or to salvation.

default.name: Solun:
default.text: Far too long has my spirit watched and waited. Watching my kingdom fall deeper and deeper into despair

default.name: Solun:
default.text: Do what you must-- but I am afraid I still stand in your way...
